titles.title: Concerning the San Diego long-range sportfishing fleet and rights to fish the waters near the Revillagigedo Islands of Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans Discharged.
Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-194.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 80.

bill.summary: 7/9/2003--Reported to House without amendment. Urges the Departments of State and of Commerce to work with their counterparts in the Mexican Government to resume issuing permits for the San Diego long-range sportfishing fleet to fish the waters within 500 meters of the Revillagigedo Islands, as they have for the past 30 years.
